title: Epidemiological approaches to refine biomarkers of aging
summary: Nature Aging, Published online: 29 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s43587-026-01064-8Studies of biomarkers of aging encounter a range of epidemiological and methodological challenges, many of which are not fully acknowledged. In this Comment, we critically examine key challenges and suggest strategies to address them.
